36: זֽוּלָתִ֞י <sup>2108 </sup> <n>Save</n> כָּלֵ֤ב <sup>3612 </sup> <n>Caleb</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יְפֻנֶּה֙ <sup>3312 </sup> <n>of Jephunneh</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִרְאֶ֔נָּה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>he shall see</n> וְלֽוֹ־ אֶתֵּ֧ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>it and to him will I give</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֛רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> דָּֽרַךְ־ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>he hath trodden upon</n> בָּ֖הּ וּלְבָנָ֑יו <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and to his children</n> יַ֕עַן <sup>3282 </sup> <n>on</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> מִלֵּ֖א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>because he hath wholly</n> אַחֲרֵ֥י <sup>310 </sup> <n>followed</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
37: גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> בִּי֙ הִתְאַנַּ֣ף <sup>599 </sup> <n>was angry</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Also the LORD</n> בִּגְלַלְכֶ֖ם <sup>1558 </sup> <n>with me for your sakes</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>even</n> אַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תָבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>Thou also shalt not go</n> שָֽׁם׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>in thither</n>
38: יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <sup>3091 </sup> <n>[But] Joshua</n> בִּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> נוּן֙ <sup>5126 </sup> <n>of Nun</n> הָעֹמֵ֣ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>which standeth</n> לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יָ֣בֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>thee he shall go in</n> שָׁ֑מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אֹת֣וֹ <sup>853 </sup> חַזֵּ֔ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>thither encourage</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יַנְחִלֶ֥נָּה <sup>5157 </sup> <n>to inherit</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>him for he shall cause Israel</n>
39: וְטַפְּכֶם֩ <sup>2945 </sup> <n>Moreover your little ones</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אֲמַרְתֶּ֜ם <sup>559 </sup> <n>which ye said</n> לָבַ֣ז <sup>957 </sup> <n>should be a prey</n> יִהְיֶ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> וּ֠בְנֵיכֶם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and your children</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָדְע֤וּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>had no knowledge</n> הַיּוֹם֙ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>which in that day</n> ט֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>between good</n> וָרָ֔ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>and evil</n> הֵ֖מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> יָבֹ֣אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>they shall go in</n> שָׁ֑מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> וְלָהֶ֣ם אֶתְּנֶ֔נָּה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thither and unto them will I give</n> וְהֵ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>and they</n> יִירָשֽׁוּהָ׃ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>it and they shall possess</n>
40: וְאַתֶּ֖ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> פְּנ֣וּ <sup>6437 </sup> <n>But [as for] you turn</n> לָכֶ֑ם וּסְע֥וּ <sup>5265 </sup> <n>you and take your journey</n> הַמִּדְבָּ֖רָה <sup>4057 </sup> <n>into the wilderness</n> דֶּ֥רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>by the way</n> יַם־ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>sea</n> סֽוּף׃ <sup>5488 </sup> <n>of the Red</n>
41: וַֽתַּעֲנ֣וּ ׀ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>Then ye answered</n> וַתֹּאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֵלַ֗י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> חָטָאנוּ֮ <sup>2398 </sup> <n>unto me We have sinned</n> לַֽיהוָה֒ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>against the LORD</n> אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> נַעֲלֶה֙ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>we will go up</n> וְנִלְחַ֔מְנוּ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>and fight</n> כְּכֹ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> צִוָּ֖נוּ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>commanded</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>according to all that the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>our God</n> וַֽתַּחְגְּר֗וּ <sup>2296 </sup> <n>us And when ye had girded</n> אִ֚ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>on every man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כְּלֵ֣י <sup>3627 </sup> <n>his weapons</n> מִלְחַמְתּ֔וֹ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> וַתָּהִ֖ינוּ <sup>1951 </sup> <n>ye were ready</n> לַעֲלֹ֥ת <sup>5927 </sup> <n>to go up</n> הָהָֽרָה׃ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>into the hill</n>
42: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֵלַ֗י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> אֱמֹ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto me Say</n> לָהֶם֙ לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תַֽעֲלוּ֙ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>unto them Go not up</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>otherwise</n> תִלָּ֣חֲמ֔וּ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>neither fight</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵינֶ֖נִּי <sup>369 </sup> <n>for</n> בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <sup>7130 </sup> <n>for I [am] not among</n> וְלֹא֙ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>otherwise</n> תִּנָּֽגְפ֔וּ <sup>5062 </sup> <n>you lest ye be smitten</n> לִפְנֵ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>341 </sup> <n>your enemies</n>
43: וָאֲדַבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>So I spake</n> אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <sup>8085 </sup> <n>unto you and ye would not hear</n> וַתַּמְרוּ֙ <sup>4784 </sup> <n>but rebelled</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פִּ֣י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>against the commandment</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַתָּזִ֖דוּ <sup>2102 </sup> <n>presumptuously</n> וַתַּעֲל֥וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>up</n> הָהָֽרָה׃ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>into the hill</n>
44: וַיֵּצֵ֨א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>came out</n> הָאֱמֹרִ֜י <sup>567 </sup> <n>And the Amorites</n> הַיֹּשֵׁ֨ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>which dwelt</n> בָּהָ֤ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>in that mountain</n> הַהוּא֙ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לִקְרַאתְכֶ֔ם <sup>7125 </sup> <n>against</n> וַיִּרְדְּפ֣וּ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>you and chased</n> אֶתְכֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ינָה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>do</n> הַדְּבֹרִ֑ים <sup>1682 </sup> <n>you as bees</n> וַֽיַּכְּת֥וּ <sup>3807 </sup> <n>and destroyed</n> אֶתְכֶ֛ם <sup>853 </sup> בְּשֵׂעִ֖יר <sup>8165 </sup> <n>you in Seir</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> חָרְמָֽה׃ <sup>2767 </sup> <n>[even] unto Hormah</n>
45: וַתָּשֻׁ֥בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>And ye returned</n> וַתִּבְכּ֖וּ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and wept</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> שָׁמַ֤ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>would not hearken</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>but the LORD</n> בְּקֹ֣לְכֶ֔ם <sup>6963 </sup> <n>to your voice</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> הֶאֱזִ֖ין <sup>238 </sup> <n>nor give ear</n> אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n>
46: וַתֵּשְׁב֥וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>So ye abode</n> בְקָדֵ֖שׁ <sup>6946 </sup> <n>in Kadesh</n> יָמִ֣ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> רַבִּ֑ים <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n> כַּיָּמִ֖ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>according unto the days</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> יְשַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that ye abode</n>
